标题: 核电站: Inspirations of Satan – V...

发布时间: 
原文链接: https://hwv430.blogspot.com/2016/06/inspirations-of-satan-various.html

正文内容:
[视频]IS大批处决记者、博客作者！ by Acneska New video released last night from the Islamic State is titled “Inspirations of Satan“. The video features multiple journalists and internet reporters/bloggers who are considered to be traitors of ISIS. They are executed by various methods, including knife to the neck, strangulation, beheading, and from bombs placed in their computers and recording devices. Props to … Continue reading "Inspirations of Satan – Various Executions of Journalists and Bloggers by ISIS" 《Inspirations of Satan – Various Executions of Journalists and Bloggers by ISIS》源地址 http://ift.tt/28WGfqx
